Posts.Content: May 2, 2008 09:56PM hhi wrote: I had a double mastectomy 4 weeks ago...... I'm looking at the chemo/radiation treatments & scared. My Surgeon says I'm healing well except for all the swelling? I had to close down my massage office after 12 years in business & that hurt. I didn't want to pay rent in a gym for a room I probably couldn't use with all the people, children & germs while going through chemo. Not sure if I made the right decision - not so sure about anything.......
Posts.Title: Anyone having surgery in April?? ottawagirl wahine
